data.name: Crimzon Clover World EXplosion Demo
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.80GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 CPU 3.40GHz(2 CPUs) or better
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce7900 GS eq. or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
